title: The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into the Best of Herd Podcast with Colin Cowherd! Joy Taylor filling in for Colin Cowherd is joined by Alex Curry bringing you the Christmas spirit on Christmas Eve! Joy defends Jimmy G's recent performance last night stating he will be the number one QB on the free market as Trey Lance is going to be the next era for the 49ers. Aaron Rodgers deserved a conversation before drafting Jordan Love. Plus, Joy gives you her favorite five upcoming NFL games and her own personal NFL Awards!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
